  • 方法详细资料

    • getMerchandise

      @CrossOrigin @GetMapping("/merchandise/{productID}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getMerchandise(@PathVariable String productID)
      Get merchandise details by ID.
      参数:
      productID - the ID of the merchandise
      返回:
      ResponseEntity containing the merchandise details or an error message

    • getMerchandise

      @CrossOrigin @GetMapping("/merchandise/search") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getMerchandise(@RequestParam Integer userId, @RequestParam String message, @RequestParam(defaultValue="0") Double minPrice, @RequestParam(defaultValue="10000") Double maxPrice, @RequestParam(required=false) String sort, @RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(defaultValue="10") int size)
      Search for merchandise by a message and return paginated results.
      参数:
      userId - the user id
      message - the search message
      minPrice - the min price for search
      maxPrice - the max price for search
      sort - the sort for search
      page - the page number
      size - the size of the page
      返回:
      ResponseEntity containing the paginated merchandise or an error message

    • getMerchandise

      @CrossOrigin @GetMapping("/allMerchandises") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getMerchandise(@RequestParam Integer userId, @RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(defaultValue="10") int limit)
      Get all merchandise with pagination.
      参数:
      userId - the user id
      page - the page number
      limit - the size of the page
      返回:
      ResponseEntity containing the paginated merchandise or an error message

    • deleteMerchandise

      @CrossOrigin @DeleteMapping("/deleteMerchandise/{Id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> deleteMerchandise(@PathVariable String Id)
      Delete merchandise by ID.
      参数:
      Id - the ID of the merchandise
      返回:
      ResponseEntity containing the deletion status or an error message

    • PurchaseMerchandise

      @CrossOrigin @PostMapping("/purchaseMerchandise") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> PurchaseMerchandise(@RequestParam Integer merchandiseId, @RequestParam Integer userId)
      Purchase merchandise.
      参数:
      merchandiseId - the ID of the merchandise
      userId - the ID of the user
      返回:
      ResponseEntity containing the transaction or an error message

    • getUserMerchandise

      @CrossOrigin @GetMapping("/merchandises/user/{userId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getUserMerchandise(@PathVariable Integer userId)
      Get all merchandise of a user.
      参数:
      userId - the ID of the user
      返回:
      ResponseEntity containing the set of merchandise or an error message

    • postMerchandise

      @CrossOrigin @PostMapping("/postMerchandise") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> postMerchandise(@RequestParam(defaultValue="-1") Integer merchandiseId, @RequestParam Integer userId, @RequestParam(defaultValue="OTHER") String sort, @RequestParam(defaultValue="ON_SALE") String status, @RequestParam String name, @RequestParam String description, @RequestParam double price, @RequestParam(required=false) org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile image)
      Post new merchandise.
      参数:
      merchandiseId - the ID of the merchandise (for editing)
      userId - the ID of the user
      sort - the sort type of the merchandise
      status - the status of the merchandise
      name - the name of the merchandise
      description - the description of the merchandise
      price - the price of the merchandise
      image - the image file of the merchandise
      返回:
      ResponseEntity containing the post status or an error message

    • getUserCart

      @CrossOrigin @GetMapping("/getCart/{userId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getUserCart(@PathVariable Integer userId)
      Get the cart items of a user.
      参数:
      userId - the ID of the user
      返回:
      ResponseEntity containing the list of cart items or an error message

    • postCart

      @CrossOrigin @PostMapping("/addCartItem") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> postCart(@RequestParam Integer userId, @RequestParam Integer merchandiseId)
      Add a cart item.
      参数:
      userId - the ID of the user
      merchandiseId - the ID of the merchandise
      返回:
      ResponseEntity containing the post status or an error message

    • deleteCartItem

      @CrossOrigin @DeleteMapping("/deleteCartItem/{Id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> deleteCartItem(@PathVariable Integer Id)
      Delete a cart item by ID.
      参数:
      Id - the ID of the cart item
      返回:
      ResponseEntity containing the deletion status or an error message

    • getTransactionsByBuyerId

      @CrossOrigin @GetMapping("/getTransaction/{buyerId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getTransactionsByBuyerId(@PathVariable Integer buyerId)
      Get transactions by buyer ID.
      参数:
      buyerId - the ID of the buyer
      返回:
      ResponseEntity containing the list of transactions or an error message

    • cancelTransaction

      @CrossOrigin @PostMapping("/cancelTransaction/{transactionId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> cancelTransaction(@PathVariable Integer transactionId)
      Cancel a transaction by ID.
      参数:
      transactionId - the ID of the transaction
      返回:
      ResponseEntity containing the cancellation status or an error message

    • completeTransaction

      @CrossOrigin @PostMapping("/completeTransaction/{merchandiseId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> completeTransaction(@PathVariable Integer merchandiseId)
      Complete a transaction by merchandise ID.
      参数:
      merchandiseId - the ID of the merchandise
      返回:
      ResponseEntity containing the completion status or an error message

    • rejectTransaction

      @CrossOrigin @PostMapping("/rejectTransaction/{merchandiseId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> rejectTransaction(@PathVariable Integer merchandiseId)
      Reject a transaction by merchandise ID.
      参数:
      merchandiseId - the ID of the merchandise
      返回:
      ResponseEntity containing the rejection status or an error message
